rule.name: CTMS_Site_SiteDetails
rule.definition: load( { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Site Details", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Protocol #", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.protocolsNumber, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Site #", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.siteIdentifier, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Site Status", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.siteStatus, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "IRB Approval", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.irbApprovalDate, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Site Initiated", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.siteInitiated, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "PI First Name", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.FirstName, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "PI LastName:", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.LastName, readOnly: true ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Account Name", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.accountName, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "# Planned Subjects", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.plannedSubjects, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Contract Amount", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: if(isnull(ri!site.contractAmount),{},dollar(ri!site.contractAmount)), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Withholding %", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!site.withholdingPercent, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Earned To Date", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: if(isnull(ri!site.earnedToDate),{},dollar(ri!site.earnedToDate)), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Paid To Date", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: if(isnull(ri!site.paidToDate),{},dollar(ri!site.paidToDate)), /*ri!site.PaidToDate,*/ readOnly: true ) } ) } )
